title: From the hut
creator_credit: Ron Verson, Lee Wright and Victoria. Audio-Visual Education Centre
brief_description: Observes the creative activities of children with logs, boards, ropes, sticks and planks as they solve, in the setting of an adventure playground, all manner of mathematical and physical problems. No narration. Filmed at Warrandyte South Primary School. Suitable for tertiary and teacher levels.
